page.title: 04LOCAL HISTORY.
page.content: A STORY OF TROON,the TRIN,the TRONE, the TRUNE. 1600/NO habitation.1609/HARBOUR was built at TRONE.1620/1744 smugglers came in sailing ships from THE ISLE OF MAN.1745/FULLARTON HOUSE was built.The FULLARTONS WERE THE KING'S FOWLERS. 1745/1808 TROON was owned by the Fullartons and a few houses were built.1803 Colonel Fullarton died.He had a REGIMENT in TROON.It was trained at the local barracks.1808/TROON was bought by the fourth Duke of PORTLAND at a sale in EDINBURGH.His name was William Cavendish Bentinck /Scott.He came from Holland.1808/1812 TROON port was built and also the first railway in Scotland.This was to bring coal to the port.The wagons were pulled by horses.The shipyard was also built.Troon was starting to grow.
